Package oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.visualInformationBuilder.businessRules.publicCommonObr.core.rules.obr.validator

Interface Summary
ExceptionHandler Excetpion handler interface.
 

Class Summary
DefaultExceptionHandler Default exception handler implementation.
ObrActionTableValidator Validator for action table.
ObrActionValidator class to validate actions.
ObrExpressionValidator Validator for expression.
ObrNestedSimpleTestValidator Class to validate nested simple test.
ObrPatternValidator Class to validate patterns,.
ObrRuleValidator Validator class to check if a rule is valid and if we can load it.
ObrSimpleTestValidator Class to validate the simple test.
UnsupportedExceptionHandler Unsupported exception handler.
 

Exception Summary
ObrRuleValidatorException Unchecked exception thrown to indicate that the rule validation failed.
UnsupportedErrorException Exception indicating there is an unsupported error.
UnsupportedFeatureException Exception indicating there is an unsupported feature.
